trans-unit.source: Install the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> in Synology DSM 7

seg-source.mrk: Install the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> in Synology DSM 7

target.mrk: Installer l'<MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> dans Synology DSM 7

trans-unit.source: A DSM 7 Synology <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> is installed using a Command Line Interface. The installation involves two stages:

seg-source.mrk: A DSM 7 Synology <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> is installed using a Command Line Interface.
The installation involves two stages:

target.mrk: Un <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> Synology DSM 7 est installé à l'aide d'une interface de ligne de commande.
L'installation comporte deux étapes :

trans-unit.source: Retrieval of the package (lina_5.3-XXXXX_X86_64.spk for Intel or lina_5.3-XXX_arm.spk for ARM, for example).

seg-source.mrk: Retrieval of the package (lina_5.3-XXXXX_X86_64.spk for Intel or lina_5.3-XXX_arm.spk for ARM, for example).

target.mrk: Récupération du paquet (lina_5.3-XXXXX_X86_64.spk pour Intel ou lina_5.3-XXX_arm.spk pour ARM, par exemple).

trans-unit.source: Installation of the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> package in the Synology administrator interface. Administrator rights are required to perform the installation.

seg-source.mrk: Installation of the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> package in the Synology administrator interface.
Administrator rights are required to perform the installation.

target.mrk: Installation du paquet <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> dans l'interface administrateur de Synology.
Les droits d'administrateur sont nécessaires pour effectuer l'installation.

trans-unit.source: If the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> is already installed on a Synology version DSM 7, you must uninstall it, then install the most recent version of the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> for Synology version DSM 7.

seg-source.mrk: If the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> is already installed on a Synology version DSM 7, you must uninstall it, then install the most recent version of the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> for Synology version DSM 7.

target.mrk: Si l'<MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> est déjà installé sur une version de Synology DSM 7, vous devez le désinstaller, puis installer la version la plus récente de l'<MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> Synology DSM 7.

trans-unit.source: Install the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable>

seg-source.mrk: Install the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable>

target.mrk: Installer l'<MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable>

trans-unit.source: Step 1: Enable the SSH service

seg-source.mrk: Step 1: Enable the SSH service

target.mrk: Étape 1 : Activer le service SSH

trans-unit.source: The SSH service must be enabled before installing the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

seg-source.mrk: The SSH service must be enabled before installing the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

target.mrk: Le service SSH doit être activé avant d'installer l'<MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

trans-unit.source: In the NAS control panel, click the Terminal & SNMP section.

seg-source.mrk: In the NAS control panel, click the Terminal & SNMP section.

target.mrk: Dans le panneau de configuration du NAS, cliquez sur la section Terminal & SNMP.

trans-unit.source: In the Terminal tab, enable the SSH service and click Apply to confirm your choice.

seg-source.mrk: In the Terminal tab, enable the SSH service and click Apply to confirm your choice.

target.mrk: Dans l'onglet Terminal, activez le service SSH et cliquez sur Appliquer pour confirmer votre choix.

trans-unit.source: Step 2: Assign access rights to the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable>

seg-source.mrk: Step 2: Assign access rights to the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable>

target.mrk: Étape 2 : Attribuer des droits d'accès à l'<MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable>

trans-unit.source: Log in to the Synology login terminal as an administrator, using an SSH client. You can use a tool like PuTTY or a Linux terminal.

seg-source.mrk: Log in to the Synology login terminal as an administrator, using an SSH client.
You can use a tool like PuTTY or a Linux terminal.

target.mrk: Connectez-vous au terminal de connexion Synology en tant qu'administrateur, à l'aide d'un client SSH.
Vous pouvez utiliser un outil comme PuTTY ou un terminal Linux.

trans-unit.source: Create the HN directory, then modify the access rights for the by running the following commands:

seg-source.mrk: Create the HN directory, then modify the access rights for the by running the following commands:

target.mrk: Créez le répertoire HN, puis modifiez les droits d'accès pour l' en exécutant les commandes suivantes :

trans-unit.source: Step 3: Install the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> package in Synology

seg-source.mrk: Step 3: Install the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> package in Synology

target.mrk: Étape 3 : Installer le paquet <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> dans Synology

trans-unit.source: Log in to the Synology web administration interface.

seg-source.mrk: Log in to the Synology web administration interface.

target.mrk: Connectez-vous à l'interface d'administration Web Synology.

trans-unit.source: In the Package Center, click Installed in the left menu pane.

seg-source.mrk: In the Package Center, click Installed in the left menu pane.

target.mrk: Dans le Centre des paquets, cliquez sur Installé dans le volet gauche.

trans-unit.source: Click Manual Install. A file explorer displays.

seg-source.mrk: Click Manual Install.
A file explorer displays.

target.mrk: Cliquez sur Installation Manuelle.
Un explorateur de fichiers s'ouvre.

trans-unit.source: Click Browse, then select the installation file. An error message indicating that the package is not verified by Synology displays.

seg-source.mrk: Click Browse, then select the installation file.
An error message indicating that the package is not verified by Synology displays.

target.mrk: Cliquez sur Parcourir, puis sélectionnez le fichier d'installation de l'.
Un message d'erreur indiquant que le paquet n'est pas vérifié par Synology s'affiche.

trans-unit.source: Confirm the package installation.

seg-source.mrk: Confirm the package installation.

target.mrk: Confirmez l'installation du paquet;

trans-unit.source: Enter the server name.

seg-source.mrk: Enter the server name.

target.mrk: Saisissez le nom du serveur.

trans-unit.source: Unselect the Run after installation option, then click Done. An error message indicating that the server has not been found may appear. This message is normal because the service is not started yet.

seg-source.mrk: Unselect the Run after installation option, then click Done.
An error message indicating that the server has not been found may appear.
This message is normal because the service is not started yet.

target.mrk: Décochez l'option Exécuter après l'installation, puis cliquez sur Terminé.
Un message d'erreur indiquant que le serveur n'a pas été retrouvé s'affiche.
Ce message est normal car le service n'est pas encore démarré.

trans-unit.source: Click OK. The package is installed, but does not start automatically.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK.
The <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> package is installed, but does not start automatically.

target.mrk: Cliquez sur OK.
Le paquet <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> est installé, mais ne démarre pas automatiquement.

trans-unit.source: In the Synology terminal, run the following command:

seg-source.mrk: In the Synology terminal, run the following command:

target.mrk: Dans le terminal Synology, exécutez la commande suivante :

trans-unit.source: sudo sed -i 's/package/root/g' /var/packages/lina/conf/privilege

seg-source.mrk: sudo sed -i 's/package/root/g' /var/packages/lina/conf/privilege

target.mrk: sudo sed -i 's/package/root/g' /var/packages/lina/conf/privilege

trans-unit.source: Step 4: Start the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable>

seg-source.mrk: Step 4: Start the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable>

target.mrk: Étape 4 : Démarrer l'<MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable>

trans-unit.source: Start the via the Package Center of the Synology server administration interface.

seg-source.mrk: Start the via the Package Center of the Synology server administration interface.

target.mrk: Démarrez l' via le Centre de paquets de l'interface d'administration du serveur Synology.

trans-unit.source: Uninstall a <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

seg-source.mrk: Uninstall a <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

target.mrk: Désinstaller l'<MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

trans-unit.source: To uninstall a <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable>

seg-source.mrk: To uninstall a <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable>

target.mrk: Pour désinstaller un <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable>

trans-unit.source: Log in to the Synology web administration interface.

seg-source.mrk: Log in to the Synology web administration interface.

target.mrk: Connectez-vous à l'interface d'administration Web Synology.

trans-unit.source: Open the Package Center.

seg-source.mrk: Open the Package Center.

target.mrk: Ouvrez le Centre des paquets.

trans-unit.source: In the menu on the left, open the Installed section.

seg-source.mrk: In the menu on the left, open the Installed section.

target.mrk: Dans le menu de gauche, ouvrez la section Installé.

trans-unit.source: Select the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />. A button with a drop-down arrow appears under the logo of the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

seg-source.mrk: Select the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.
A button with a drop-down arrow appears under the logo of the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

target.mrk: Sélectionnez l'<MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.
Un bouton avec une flèche déroulante apparaît sous le logo de l'<MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

trans-unit.source: Click the drop-down arrow, then click Uninstall. A confirmation window appears.

seg-source.mrk: Click the drop-down arrow, then click Uninstall.
A confirmation window appears.

target.mrk: Cliquez sur la flèche de la liste déroulante, puis cliquez sur Désinstaller.
Une fenêtre de confirmation s'affiche.

trans-unit.source: To update <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, keep the database.

seg-source.mrk: To update <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, keep the database.

target.mrk: Pour mettre <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> à jour, conservez la base de données.

trans-unit.source: To uninstall <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> permanently, delete the database.

seg-source.mrk: To uninstall <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> permanently, delete the database.

target.mrk: Pour désinstaller définitivement <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, supprimez la base de données.
